name: RPScreenRecorderDelegate
desc: The protocol you implement to receive notifications from the screen recorder.

items.name: func screenRecorder(RPScreenRecorder, didStopRecordingWith: RPPreviewViewController?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Indicates that the screen recording has stopped.

items.name: func screenRecorderDidChangeAvailability(RPScreenRecorder)
items.desc: Indicates that the recorder has changed states between disabled and enabled.
